name: AMPdoc
short_description: AMPdoc mblazquez edition is a portable package with Apache, MySQL, PHP, and Perl which includes a selection of documentary software applications for libraries, archives, museums, publishers, conferences and documentation centers. AMPdoc mblazquez edition enables to perform workflow management duties, publication of contents, web positioning, among others. Usually, difficulty in installing and configuring of necessary applications has limited the access to technologies to information professionals. With AMP doc mblazquez edition any information professional can use different documentary software in accordance with his needs, without requiring installation. In addition, it can run on any computer running Windows. This package seeks to democratize Documentary Technologies, providing support and contributes to moving towards modernization and the update of knowledge in this area.
summary: Apache, MySQL, PHP package for library, archive, museum automation
